readme:
# Web-Based Visualizer for Simulation Environments

This repository hosts a browser-based 3D viewer for physical simulators. It offers users the ability to observe simulations directly within their web browser, as an alternative to the default visualizer that comes with the simulator.

The main feature of this repo is that you only need to modify a server lines of your code to port the visualization on the default simulator viewer to the web visualizer. This feature is especially useful for visualizing simulation on a headless server. For example, train and visualize the IsaacGym tasks inside [jupyter notebook](example/isaacgym/train_isaacgym_remote_server.ipynb) on a remote server.

Below is a detailed README.md of repository. Please write a repository sketch in the form of a tree, including all folders, files, as well as imports information if necessary.

---
README.md
---
# Web-Based Visualizer for Simulation Environments

This repository hosts a browser-based 3D viewer for physical simulators. It offers users the ability to observe simulations directly within their web browser, as an alternative to the default visualizer that comes with the simulator.

The main feature of this repo is that you only need to modify a server lines of your code to port the visualization on the default simulator viewer to the web visualizer. This feature is especially useful for visualizing simulation on a headless server. For example, train and visualize the IsaacGym tasks inside [jupyter notebook](example/isaacgym/train_isaacgym_remote_server.ipynb) on a remote server.

---
Repository Sketch
---
output:
Here is a practicable repository sketch.

```
.
├── README.md
├── setup.py
├── example
|   ├── isaacgym
|   |   ├── run_isaacgym_training_viz.py # import isaacgym; import gym; from isaacgym import gymapi;
|   |   └── run_isaacgym_viz.py # import isaacgym  # pylint: disable=unused-import; from isaacgym import gymapi;
|   ├── sapien
|   |   ├── hello_world.py # from sim_web_visualizer import bind_visualizer_to_sapien_scene, create_sapien_visualizer;
|   |   ├── replay_maniskill_demo.py # from sim_web_visualizer import bind_visualizer_to_sapien_scene, create_sapien_visualizer;
|   |   └── run_sapien_viz.py # from sim_web_visualizer import bind_visualizer_to_sapien_scene, create_sapien_visualizer;
|   └── visualize_urdf
|       └── render_urdf.py # from sim_web_visualizer import MeshCatVisualizerBase;
└── sim_web_visualizer
    ├── __init__.py
    ├── base_visualizer_client.py
    ├── isaac_visualizer_client.py # from isaacgym import gymapi, gymtorch;
    ├── sapien_visualizer_client.py
    ├── parser
    |   ├── __init__.py
    |   ├── mesh_parser.py
    |   ├── mjcf.py
    |   ├── urdf.py
    |   └── yourdfpy.py
    └── utils
        ├── __init__.py
        └── rotation_utils.py
```
